reviews.text:
A massive thanks to all the teachers at Cape, Danielle Dexter Sarah you guys are amazing :-))) When i drop my sons, i know they in safe hands.
My boys have been attending Cape since Aug 20 and have had so much fun. With a warm welcome from the team my boys are loving been part of Cape. Esp during this crazy times with all happening the team keeps up such a joyful atmosphere for the kids.. hats off to your guys really appreciate you all.
The team is fantastic always welcoming, friendly and care so much for all kids at cape. Just wanted to say thank you so much for working so well with my sons its much appreciated.
Staff are great! Brilliant outside playground

This replaces my previous review which was a glowing one.  Two of the three regular play workers have recently left.  They were a fantastic team but, without being able to use the indoor facilities (due to Covid) and with kids becoming increasingly desocialized after a year without normal activities, it's no longer a safe, happy place to leave children.  This is not the fault of the play workers, but they are not currently able to offer activities that can keep young minds occupied and out of trouble.  My kid used to love Cape - it was her third space after home and school - now she finds it boring and says the new play leader is angry and rude.

Outstanding!
A wonderful place where the children are free to enjoy the outdoors. The staff are caring, nurturing and saftey orientated. We are so grateful for this service and for the excellent care the staff take of our children. Thank you, you are appreciated! Shane & Mum.

STRONGLY NOT RECOMMENDED & NOT TRUSTED PLACE...

I have found a new manager Daniel and a new staff Sarah cannot deal with an incident fairly...
Additionally, I have witnessed a child saying that he was called an idiot and Sarah's reply was nothing been said nor dealt with the incident...?!
Very disappointed with the staff...

address: 85 Crouch Hill, London N8 9EG, United Kingdom
